ui
Class FilmStrip

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ui.FilmStrip
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, FSAGraphSubscriber, WorkspaceSubscriber
public class FilmStrip
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements WorkspaceSubscriber, FSAGraphSubscriber, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

A panel of graph thumbnail views to navigate among multiple automata and highlight the border of the currently active graph.

Author:
Helen Bretzke, Lenko Grigorov
See Also:
Serialized Form

FilmStrip

Method Detail

buildThumbnailBox

private void buildThumbnailBox()
Packs each graph view into it's own panel with titled border. The current graph model is rendered with a highlighted border. Dirty models are shown with name decorated by an asterisk.

refreshGraphViews

private void refreshGraphViews()
Gets all graph models from the workspace and renders each in its own view.

modelCollectionChanged

public void modelCollectionChanged(WorkspaceMessage message)
Description copied from interface: WorkspaceSubscriber
Notifies this subscriber that a model collection change (a DES model is created or opened (added), closed (removed) or renamed) has occurred in a WorkspacePublisher to which I have subscribed.

Specified by:
modelCollectionChanged in interface WorkspaceSubscriber
Parameters:
message - details of the change notification

modelSwitched

public void modelSwitched(WorkspaceMessage message)
Description copied from interface: WorkspaceSubscriber
Notifies this subscriber that a the model type has been switched (the type of active model has changed e.g. from FSA to petri net) in a WorkspacePublisher to which I have subscribed.

Specified by:
modelSwitched in interface WorkspaceSubscriber
Parameters:
message - details of the change notification
